title: How can I turn on the screen using gestures?
answer:
Yes. You can turn on the screen using wrist gestures, such as by tilting or lifting your wrist.

Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733ba_w3eae.png "click to enlarge") in the Android Wear app to access the settings menu, select your Huawei Watch under **DEVICE SETTINGS**, and select **Tilt to wake screen**.
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733bb_mx1r0.gif) NOTE: 

If you have enabled Theater mode, you can only turn on the screen by pressing the power button.
